title: AI-Powered Cybersecurity for Retail Trust
narration: Welcome We're showcasing how AIpowered cybersecurity builds trust in retail especially for giants like Walmart. In today's digital world protecting customer data is absolutely critical.

title: The Threat Landscape
content:
Millions of daily transactions at risk.
Attackers exploit peak events like Black Friday.
Traditional security struggles with real-time threats.
narration: Imagine millions of daily transactions including online orders and pointofsale payments are vulnerable. Attackers often exploit events like Black Friday to mimic users and bypass payment systems. Traditional security measures simply can't keep up with these sophisticated realtime threats.

title: Our AI Solution: Real-Time Protection
content:
AI-powered fraud and anomaly detection.
Monitors user behavior and access patterns.
Provides twenty-four/seven data protection.
narration: We've built an AIpowered fraud and anomaly detection system specifically for largescale retail. Our system continuously monitors user behavior access patterns and transaction data around the clock. This allows us to detect and respond to threats in real time.

title: Key Features
content:
**AI-Driven Detection**
Behavior Profiling: Detects unusual activity.
AI Models: Flags suspicious patterns using Isolation Forest and XGBoost.
**Secure Infrastructure**
Secure Access: Role-based access and multi-factor authentication.
Immutable Logs: Securely logs all events for traceability.
narration: Our solution utilizes several key features. First AIdriven detection through behavior profiling and advanced AI models. Second a secure infrastructure featuring rolebased access multifactor authentication and immutable logs to ensure data integrity and accountability.

title: Real-World Impact
content: System flags suspicious login and payment failure, blocking fraudulent transaction in real time.
narration: Consider this scenario a customer logs in from two different cities in rapid succession and then experiences a failed payment. Our system immediately flags this activity alerts administrators and blocks the transaction effectively stopping fraud in real time.

title: Tech Stack
content:
React, Tailwind
Node.js, Python (Scikit-learn)
MongoDB, Redis
JWT, MFA
narration: Our system is built on a robust and modern tech stack. This includes React and Tailwind for the front end Node.js and Python with Scikitlearn for the backend MongoDB and Redis for data storage and caching and JWT and MFA for secure authentication.

title: Scalable, Intelligent Defense
content:
Scalable defense for millions of customers.
Intelligent threat detection.
Builds customer trust and confidence.
narration: Our AIdriven solution provides retailers with a scalable and intelligent defense system. This secures millions of customers builds trust and provides confidence in the retailer's commitment to data protection. Thank you for watching
